Senior Data Automation & Cloud Engineer

Transforming complex data challenges into scalable, automated solutions. Leveraging expertise from Apple and Google to build intuitive and high-performing digital experiences.

Let's Connect View My Work

About Me

With a background that spans crafting intuitive interfaces at Apple and building scalable web experiences at Google, I bring a unique blend of human-centered design and technical excellence to every project. My passion lies in reducing cognitive load, ensuring visual clarity, and creating user journeys that are both effective and delightful. I specialize in automating complex processes and leveraging cloud technologies to drive efficiency and innovation.

My approach is always to understand the user's needs deeply, translating them into elegant and robust solutions. I'm adept at turning visitors into opportunities by building trust through consistent, high-quality execution and demonstrating expertise strategically.

Professional Experience

Senior Software Engineer – Data Automation

Eurofins IT – Bangalore, India July 2022 – August 2024
  • Designed and implemented a scalable data pipeline (ETL) to collect, transform, and load tenant data from 38 Azure tenants into a centralized repository using Python, Azure Data Factory, and Power BI.
  • Led a team of six engineers as Scrum Master in a data migration project, coordinating across multiple countries to migrate SharePoint data, delivering the project ahead of schedule.
  • Developed a PowerApps app integrated with SQL Stored Procedures for internal data tracking, automating data entry across 146 office locations, reducing manual input and improving data consistency.
  • Created a data pipeline to automate the migration of 6TB of unstructured data from on-premises SharePoint servers to Azure Blob Storage and SharePoint Online.
  • Built data ingestion and processing pipelines for Microsoft 365 (M365) activity logs, decreasing audit time by 70% through automation.

Software Engineer

Eurofins IT – Bangalore, India June 2018 – June 2022
  • Created and deployed scheduled jobs using Azure DevOps to consolidate application logs from 18 servers across 3 environments into a unified database.
  • Developed the Eurofins travel request portal, reducing processing time from 10 days to 3 days and providing real-time access to historical data via Power BI.
  • Created a web app to automate loading data into a SharePoint List, making dynamic email distribution lists (1600 entries) accessible to 60k+ users.

Featured Projects

Sentiment Analysis Pipeline

Engineered a Python-based sentiment analysis pipeline that scraped Amazon & Peloton reviews using BeautifulSoup and PySpark, ingested data into PostgreSQL, and delivered interactive insights via a Streamlit dashboard.

GitHub Live Demo

FIFA Striker Market Value Predictor

Developed a regression model leveraging player performance, physical attributes, and stats to forecast football strikers' market value, empowering smarter scouting and investment decisions.
